story.title: From manual work to automated results
story.p1: I've always loved building businesses. From a childhood chess school to scaling ventures as a teenager, the game of entrepreneurship was my passion.
story.p2: But as my businesses grew, I hit a wall. I wasn't growing anymore—I was stuck doing paperwork, managing invoices, and chasing admin. I saw this everywhere, from the fitness industry to outdoor startups. Founders were being slowed down by their own success because their systems couldn't keep up.
story.p3: I decided to fix it. I became a software engineer to master the tools that scale companies. Today, I don't just write code; I build automated systems for businesses so owners can stop doing busywork and start making an impact. I build the systems I wish I had when I was starting out.
